snippet: Advent International, a European private equity firm, agreed to sell Domestic and General, an extended warranty company, to CVC Capital Partners for about $1.2 billion.
abstract: Advent International, a European private equity firm, agreed to sell Domestic and General, an extended warranty company, to CVC Capital Partners for about $1.2 billion.

headline.main: CVC Capital to Buy Extended Warranty Company for $1.2 Billion
